title: Eke nirdayanAguve
sahitya:
Eke nirdayanAguve rangayya ranga ekE nirdayanAguve


anupallavi

  Eke nirdaya ranga kAruNya patiyenna sAkuvudu ninna bhAra pAkashAsana vandya


caraNam 1    aridu pADuvenedare rangayya ninna aridavarArayya ariya bArada 
ninna honduvudhyAngayya ariyadavanu nAnu dAri tOrisO nInu
    caraNam 2    sulabhanu nInendu ninna baLige baLali bandeno doreye sulabha 
nInAdare olidu salahabEkoceluva mUruti krSNa enna biTTagalade
    caraNam 3    eSTu divasa hariye I muccATa kaSTa paDisa bEDavo 
eSTiddaru nA mADidaparAda aStu maredu enna iStade kai piDiyo
    caraNam 4    mAtu mAtige ninna nAmagaLannu hE tAta nuDidenallade 
nItiya pELayya vAtajanayyane dUtanu nAnayya dUra mADade kaNDya
    caraNam 5    nambike illadantha Dambava paDede Dambhaka bombeyAde 
dambhatanava biDiso ninnanghriya tOriso ambujAkSa tande purandara viTTalane
